website_summaries.verdict: As far as actual steam models go, this portable sauna delivers very well and is extremely lightweight and portable.
pros: Heats up quickly and delivers a therapeutic, very hot sauna experience to relieve your stress and relax muscles
One of the lightest models we reviewed, coming in at just over 10 pounds
cons: Being too close to the steam pipe can easily cause an accidental burn
Put down a towel as recommended

customer_reviews.title: Beats paying for a steam room!
customer_reviews.text: I love this steam tent! For a $100 it's hard to beat building any sort of steam room. The boiler puts out a decent amount of steam. I usually put a towel over the head hole in the top and sit inside it so I get the max effect from the steam.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nussbaum

customer_reviews.title: Makes plenty of steam!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Takes a few minutes to start producing full steam on a cold water fill (approx. 15 min.) but after that it will produce good steam for an hour. Sets up easy enough. Only issue I have could be with the floor and stitching durability. With the support bar up you can see the stitches stress enough to open up holes around them. If you choose to sit in a chair I would put a towel down to protect the flooring too. Aromatherapy oils work fine. I like sitting completely inside covering the neck hole with a towel although it's not the most comfortable with a back rest.
customer_reviews.author: JstaRnr

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got mines. It works like a charm and it was super easy to setup..and it took less than a week! I can't stay out of it!! Even my son is using it. I would recommend this little piece of heaven to anyone..I won't be using the one at the gym anymore , not when I can be in the comfort of my own home!!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where is the water line indicator and how much water is safe
customer_reviews.text: I received my machine yeserday and im already having issues with the steam machine. I read on review someone sat for 45 mins straight. I cant get my machine to stay on for 5 mins, before it shuts off. Where is the water line indication on the steam machine. My steamer is having issues with producing steam steadily. It shuts off and on with only 30 secs of steam out put. Timer is on but the light indicator on machine flickers on and off. Please help. This is supposed to be used for relaxation and I'm getting so frustrated. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: macnewelly

customer_reviews.title: ORDERED OVER 6!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! My mom and I love this steam sauna! My mom purchased about over 6 of these saunas already because every one in our family wanted one. It really helps you relax and I love how convenient it is at your own home. My mom used special herbs inside the steamer and it really helps you detox. My mom also lost sig. amount of weight using this sauna as it helps her sweat and get rid of excess water weight! Love this! Thank you! I hope it works the same for you.
customer_reviews.author: Naly

customer_reviews.title: Good not so great.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this 2 days and the bar H has already fell off the piece that holds it to unlatch is melted off per say. Disappointed also this thing is kind of tall so depending on your chair you use will cause it to cave in more. I will keep using it until to falls apart being that it's to late to return it. Gets hot good sweat and stuff. And for my mom I think it would be a little harder to get in and out this I think my aunts version was bigger.. I'm like a size 10-12 body type.
customer_reviews.author: Dede24

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my heck I love this little steamer. Hubby put a small folding cam chair in it for me. We really wanted to purchase a steam sauna but the price is so high for 20 min we found this affordable unit and we LOVE it. For the price you can’t go wrong. We spray it down with Lysol and just leave it up all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Isom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice item
customer_reviews.text: This portable steamer is pretty cool, however, it would have been much nicer if it came with a chair. It's important to get a chair that is high enough so that the steam doesn't hit directly on your back. It's really hot and you could risk burning yourself. It was very easy to put together and although the instructions really didn't tell you how to use the steamer, it's pretty self explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice. Gets super hot and is very convenient. You just have to make sure you have space in your home for it because once it's set up it stays up. I also wish I could control the temp while in it because it gets so hot I can't stay in longer than 10 minutes. Also, I had an issue during setup and the seller was excellent with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost like it burned
customer_reviews.text: I order this expecting a new one. Pieces are put together and couple of them are even broke at the ends. The fabric on the bottom has brown marks. Almost like it burned. Just getting over flu first day had strength to put together. So disappointed and disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: ... 6' and don't mind sitting cross-legged in it then great. Or use a low-to-the-ground camp chair and drape ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're 6' and don't mind sitting cross-legged in it then great. Or use a low-to-the-ground camp chair and drape a towel across the back so the steam input doesn't get ya. For the price you can soak in a hot steam bath for less than $100. We've used this several times and it has no problems. We put in hot water and it is ready in just a few minutes. Something to use while we install a real steam room later this year.
customer_reviews.author: Hubstermeister

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it everyday-sometimes twice. The steam is enough for me. I close the head hole to keep in the steam and sit on a towel. If it lasts, I think I will use this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: profile name #143

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and for the price I payed for is great. One piece came defective but the seller was very responsive and sent a replacement piece right away. I read the reviews before purchase and took the advise of placing a few towels on the floor to enjoy full body sauna benefits, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This Sauna really works! I was drenched in 15 minutes. Only issue I have is getting in and out with the pole in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Shonnie

customer_reviews.title: Careful- it’s HOT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I have EVER purchased! Awesome steam. This particular steam room was recommended to me by a friend and we LOVE it! But for real- don’t get too close to the steam hole- it will burn you!
customer_reviews.author: Tucker Norrell

customer_reviews.title: I love the sauna
customer_reviews.text: I love the sauna, it was easy to assemble. I will state that the cross bar, broke really easy. but did not distrubed the usability of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it, soaking and sweating in about 5mins after it warms up. I actually don't use a chair to sit in it, my whole body is in the tent for 20 mins and everything closed except the hole where my head is suppose to be sticking out.
customer_reviews.author: drelinamoore

customer_reviews.title: Should have saved my money and put towards a real sauna
customer_reviews.text: It gets hot as can be. Im just not impressed by the structure. It falls down all the time. There is a pvc pipe that has come off everytime I get in it regardless of pushing each pipe together.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mama

customer_reviews.title: Very  fragile
customer_reviews.text: This Sauna works as stated; however, it is very fragile. The crossbar snapped off so easily during my attempt to put it together. I am hoping this part can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: JAQueen

customer_reviews.title: Back pain reduced after using 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Pro. Works well meaning I actually had less back pain after using 30 minutes Con cross bar broke after 1 use which is supposed to swing open and closed after entering but is not really needed
customer_reviews.author: TECHNOMOM

customer_reviews.title: I love my little steam tent!!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this thing! It’s great for sore muscles, arthritis and general well being. I put a couple drops of eucalyptus (aromatherapy liquid) and it’s great. I can only do about 15-20 minutes before I heat up too much but working towards 30. We used a thermometer and the highest it got was 116 F, which is hot after sitting in it for a bit. I recommend this model because not only is it good for the body but only being a $100 bucks you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts and unable to get thru to Customer Service. Smdh. No choice but to return and unable to reorder because out of stock. Customer Service has been terrible since Pandemic .
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: The pipes are labeled amazing for how they go together but once it’s together it’s great quality for the price point. Works well for what I need it for which is weekly sessions. Light weight and easy to move around if you don’t want to fold it back up after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Smash W

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product,  not professional  but get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about the BMI of the 1⭐ reviews but mine work great...yes the poles come loose but make sure they are pushed in and your are fine. My kids lost one of the corner connectors and I still used it just fine
customer_reviews.author: Candice Harvey

customer_reviews.title: My own Spa!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, I so look forward to getting into this and spending time. The assembly was easy once I laid everything out. No problems with it and I've had it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It works great and it puts out alot more steam than I thought it would and very hot. Have it in my living room and can sit and steam while watching TV. Heats up fast (about 10-15 minutes) and is wonderful for my skin. Would recommend to anyone who wants an indoor steamer. I already have a hot tub (outside) - but there are times I want to be indoors due to weather and convenience - so love it.
customer_reviews.author: Regina F. Winkles

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful! Like to sit on the floor on folded ...
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! Like to sit on the floor on folded towels to get the full effect. Adding essential oils gives a great bonus. It's like having a spa at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jungian Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging, love the color and quality of the material. Pros: Gets good steam Sweated like crazy 5 mins in Cons: First time use and the front bar screw come straight out the bar. This issue needs to be fixed,too many reviews with that same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I work from home and was able to put it together on my 30 minute lunch break. It’s truly that easy. You sweat instantly. The material could be a bit thicker but for the price I’m in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera

customer_reviews.title: It definitely does it job in generating a good amount of steam
customer_reviews.text: It definitely does its job in generating a good amount of steam. I was dripping with sweat after about 20 minutes. But the frame of this is SO cheaply made I almost lost my mind putting it together. The collection of PVC-like pipes that consist of the frame kept falling apart while I was assembling it. I finally called my teenage son and we duct taped everything together. I will enjoy the experience until the steam causes the tape to fall apart. This will due as a temporary measure but know that you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carter

customer_reviews.title: It feels great being inside this as I imagine fat just melting ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels great being inside this as I imagine fat just melting off of me. Even a couple of hours after my first session, I commented on how good I felt! Two of my friends have already purchased their own. What an easy way to treat yourself! It feels like I was just at a spa.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, broke putting together
customer_reviews.text: Got the sauna. As I was putting it together a connecter piece snapped and broke. Got it fully assembled and found there is no tubing or inside cup for the steamer to connect to the sauna and nothing for the inside to steam the sauna. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lance Ellsworth of Alpine Utah

customer_reviews.title: The Foldable Athletic Chair is missing.
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box and assembling the product, I noticed that there was no ‘Foldable Athletic Chair’. So, I will appreciate if you send me the missing chair. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Priscek

customer_reviews.title: Great for winters.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to install. The whole structure is a little bit flimsy. The steam maker works fine. The tube that attaches steam maker and the sauna is too short. The knob in steam maker comes out whic is a bit defective and difficult to use at times. Overall useful and produces good amount of steam. I Recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't go wrong. I sit comfortably inside (I'm 5'7 155lbs). I don't use a stool as I want my entire body to be steamed. I can only tolerate 15 to 20 minutes. It gets pretty hot, which is great. I would definitely recommend this product. Oh, sometimes I add oils to change things up. Peppermint is pretty refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother since she cannot get out to her regular gym and sauna! She loves it! She was able to put it together by herself and uses it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to the local dumpster
customer_reviews.text: I have spent hours trying to put this thing together.... I owned my own wood crate business and did install the PVC pipe for the nail and staple guns.... I have had to use gorrila glue.... On this sauna... This is cheap junk! I want my money back .... Someone needs to contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I asked for a refund and there customer service was great and helpful
customer_reviews.text: item was broken when arrived , very bulky and tubes are a bit flimsy. I asked for a refund and there customer service was great and helpful. It does however steam up very good if this is what your looking for in your home
customer_reviews.author: M. Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely amazing! I have chronic urticaria also known as heat ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing! I have chronic urticaria also known as heat hives and sweat therapy is the only solution I have found for myself so far to have a normal life. 15-30 minutes a day and I am practically cured. I love this product so much.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Sellers

customer_reviews.title: youtube.com/thevalueking
customer_reviews.text: I did a full in depth review on my youtube channel type thevalueking all together on youtube and it should come up i cant post the link :( but the product works great but its a bit flimsy might not last over 6 months but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sauna works fine
customer_reviews.text: This steam sauna works fine, have used many times . Feb 2019
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: 4'x4' excellent
customer_reviews.text: wife loves it but she made 2 lower holes to take feet out when to warm.about 17 minutes to get it working steam wise each time.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great Value, Great Price Did a great job in just little time. Started with hot water, ready in 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Peg Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Really?!?
customer_reviews.text: Such ridiculous quality on the tent. The fabric and evaporater work fine. The plastic pipes are so crazy cheap and un thought out.
customer_reviews.author: michael j schneider

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! Use it twice a month
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! Use it twice a month. Wish I could do it weekly. Saunas are so beneficial for your health. Research the benefits and you'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Belky

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Steam tent gets hot. The steam generator works especially well if you pre boil the water. The hinge component of the bar broke and I received a replacement very very quickly. Customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: FraaJad

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: really hot really quickly! Love it! I feel impurities leaving my body! ( needs a little more sturdy frame )
customer_reviews.author: Brenda E

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: although it does not specify colors. we bought this based on the pink because my gf wanted the pink but it arrived in a blue... just beware. other than that after a few weeks of use things seem to be working as described
customer_reviews.author: Yahdatshim

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was right on time nice and in perfect condition all the parts were there ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was right on time nice and in perfect condition all the parts were there labled and with directions and this thing works awesome i give u guy a 110% thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the arm broke before we got it to use it. very cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: MrsMidwest98

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works nice. frame is NOT sturdy though. Could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! My entire family loves it
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! My entire family loves it! Easy to assemble and a Great Buy for the price. I've used it non-stop since purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really a great buy. It’s a little bit of a pain to set up, but it works just great. The steam generator puts out plenty of steam for its size and it gets plenty hot. My son loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: little bit delicate but worth using it.. i ...
customer_reviews.text: little bit delicate but worth using it.. i tried it several times and it was worth your money. make sure you close the airpipe tightly and the Steam nozzle secured before using it.
customer_reviews.author: Avanthi Chava

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment.
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is a great investment, I don't need to go to the gym to use the wet sauna anymore and it fits in just about any corner of the house. I have used it many times and is awesome!! The only con is that it takes about 15-20 minutes, not 10 like the instructions say, to get the steamer hot. Once it starts working, it warms up to around 110 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo Mayorga

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot super fast!!
customer_reviews.text: Really love how this steam sauna gets hot very fast. It only took 15min for me to fully start dripping in sweat. If you are looking for a steam sauna to get hot fast and sweat, this is the steam sauna to buy. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christian B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product that does exactly what a normal steam room ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product that does exactly what a normal steam room does! Heads up fast and is very easy to assemble!!!! LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs one of these babies!!!!! It really helps detox your body. It is just like the saunas at the gym. It helped my family and I fight off the worst sickness ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ethnic Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Well worth the price. Only thing, make sure you put the steam in a place where it will not burn you. It gets very hot.
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA N. WILSON

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It was easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It was easy to setup, and it does not take up alot of room. Add water abd turn it on. Too easy. It gets pretty steamy quick and I have not been able to do an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the cheap product!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material! It does the job! but think twice before paying over 100$! And be very careful with it! 2 weeks after owning 2 pieces have broke!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should buy a spare!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great price, good material, stays hot, easy clean up. Have been telling everyone I know. Saved me from getting a gym membership for just the use of the steam room.
customer_reviews.author: ReadItAndWeep

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from Chronic Lyme Disease, so I must detox constantly.. I bought this and use it all the time! It was so easy to put together, and it's easy to wipe down after each use! (Dry towel and then Lysol wipes)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. No more bacteria laden health club steam rooms
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Works great. No more bacteria laden health club steam rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Bestkept

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for muscle pain and stiffness associated with lupus. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Kicks out the steam, but needs better assembly
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how to assemble, this product is very good!! It needs to come with better detailed assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Mckay

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works really well and I like how I can just set it up and break it down as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I love my steam sauna, best $100 ive ever spent :)
customer_reviews.author: The Organic Blondie

customer_reviews.title: but fits the space nicely and reasonably easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This work really well for the price. I'm sure it won't last forever, but fits the space nicely and reasonably easy to use. The water level line needs to be more obvious: VERY HARD TO FIND!! Make sure to really push the pieces together tightly and I would try to find a place to put it were you don't have to take it down often. Directions, suggestions would be really nice, like fill with hot water to spread up steaming and add essential oils directly to the water for auromatherapy. Overall happy with the unit and it gives a really nice steam!
customer_reviews.author: LCal

customer_reviews.title: Steamy
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Doesn’t come with chair like MOST at a lower price but still works well. Set up was easy
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gibbs_toyou

customer_reviews.title: Great steam, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Great steam, cheaply made. I plan on keeping the steamer & building a better frame out of better pvc pipe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the price. I struggled to find the right chair to fit inside but I eventually did and its working out great!
customer_reviews.author: ashley orvis

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part!
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived with missing parts! Only 1 Part D was included.
customer_reviews.author: H. W.

customer_reviews.title: Works good and the heater really steams out water
customer_reviews.text: Works good and the heater really steams out water, Over time the outside rips too easily and the front part of the frame broke off
customer_reviews.author: Alaric Raid

customer_reviews.title: general
customer_reviews.text: The bottom quality is not good, it is easy to break, and there is a gap between the price and the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Max li

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: durherm portable personal folding home steam it work good but the bar brake fast
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to use this, but it unfortunately broke 2 minutes into assembling. A little on the cheap side. But I’m sure it would have worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought as a joke but we love it!! gets crazy hot!!
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Great for detox and acne reduction.
customer_reviews.text: I cant complain on this one. It has a neck velcro to keep the steam inside the sauna. The water turns into steam in around 10 minutes. The sauna is well insulated and comfortable. The temperature does not get overwhelming like some of the other saunas. The only thing i would suggest is changing the control with optional remote for run time. This allows the user to have greater flexibility in running and stopping the sauna without having to get out all the time, Also i accidentally fell because i had a bad chair and broke one of the contact pipes which i am wondering how to replace for the front.
customer_reviews.author: DreamBig

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Hi, My steamer is not working and it is new. Any troubleshooting ideas?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars.......DO NOT BUY...........this thing is not worth what you pay for....the zipper is so cheap and doesnt even zip up without gaps....one of the plastic pieces was broken....and of course to send it back you have to pay for the shipping.......buyer beware....dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Steam generator stopped working after 10 min of use
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the item,as the steam generator stopped working after first 10 min of use
customer_reviews.author: daiga

customer_reviews.title: Just be very careful
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a beginners less expensive option however, I CRITICALLY WARN... be very careful not to burn yourself. The tube that the steam comes out burned my leg and my back.
customer_reviews.author: twaneshia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This sauna gets super hot like a regular sauna. Easy to put together and came within a few days. I don't regret buying this. It gets hot quick and you can use it with or without a chair, I prefer without because I like for my face to sweat also. Its big inside. I'm well over 250 and I fit inside comfortably. I like to use my tiny bluetooth speaker while im in there with it opened just a tiny bit so it doesnt get overwhelming. Great product and I will be sure to tell my friends and family who are interested!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I've used it 3 times and although I LOVE IT, the last time I used it the ...
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY WISH THERE WERE MORE DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS!!! I've used it 3 times and although I LOVE IT, the last time I used it the sensor popped off. I'm not sure if it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised, gets very hot. When finished just wipe with dry towel inside and let air out and your are go to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Omg love it .. i sweat so much . And afterwards I feel so good and relax
customer_reviews.author: Veehales

customer_reviews.title: I Am Not Bob The Builder!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pieces that make up the frame poorly fit together, it took me an hour to put up the sauna because every five seconds something would come undone. Eventually I got so sick and tired of this that I went to two different stores just to buy some duct tape to hold this piece of sh!t together. The sauna works really good though.
customer_reviews.author: Demi Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with product. Only had a month but works very well. Gets hotter than expected. I can usually tolerate the sauna and steam room a long time but only 45 minutes in this portable steam sauna.
customer_reviews.author: pg

customer_reviews.title: awesome steam
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this would be too small for me, (I'm 6'3") so I had to get a small stool and I still have to scrunch down somewhat but I only stay in the steam for 20 minutes so it's OK. The steam is great even when it's cold. I do it on my unheated back porch. What a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aberjoe

customer_reviews.title: Get the Sweating, it works... Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I love this Sauna steamer it is great, if you are small enough put ur whole body in feels wonderful be careful of where steam comes out, don't wanna burn yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I recommend putting a towel down in the inside floor. I absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use; good to leave it set up as the bars aren't that quick to put together on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Martineau

customer_reviews.title: GET YOUR GLASSES OUT
customer_reviews.text: Need magnifying glass to read manual Said line inside container to fill. Did not have any line in the steamer for fill line.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have told several friends who have also purchased!!!! Thank you for making this and making it affordable!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: daisy johnson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with it. I add some oils to the steamer and enjoy that heat during the cold winter. Few caveats: there’s no chair included and you need to turn the pipes sideways, so that the steam is not directed at your petutie. One more thing is that I started putting a towel inside the sauna while using, otherwise you will have a puddle on the floor afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Cambria

customer_reviews.title: Zipper and frame issue but got replacement
customer_reviews.text: Love how hot it got but hate the long wait to get it going.The zipper in the front had issues and would split open. Frame was plastic and hard to unassemble. The steam maker is good but the steam line from unit is short. Customer service was good and got me a replacement tent.
customer_reviews.author: HcP

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: There was a damaged piece. I have to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this...I need to find a comfortable chair but at 5'10" I wouldn't expect that to be an easy task so that is not a negative for me. Easy to use, a little annoying to set up so I just leave it set up. Great for steaming with essential oils when you are sick. I just throw in a cotton ball soaked in the oils into the tent, I don't add to the water as I'm not sure if that'll mess up the steamer. But again that's not a negative for me either. I love this steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: Sexy, Soft skin
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say I am in love with this product. My skin feels amazing
customer_reviews.author: Julie C. Francis

product_meta.title: Lightweight Personal Steam Sauna by Durasage for Relaxation at Home, 60 Min Timer - Pink
product_meta.description:
This Unique High Quality Portable Steam Sauna with exclusive beneficial features, finally can be affordable and used in privacy of your home or apartment or any living environment without large spaces & special communications for it. This product uses the steam about 45 C (113+ degrees Fahrenheit ). 

 It's design include the most desirable features the expansive and fancy Saunas have. The only additional items that are needed are a towel, a small seat (a plastic garden chair or a wooded stool is ideal) and plain tap water. When finished, any small amount of condensing water that is produced can easily be wiped up with a towel from the inside of the bath tub. 

 Use hot steam which in suitable temperature as intermediary. With separated steam generator and bathtub design, our product supply more safety for user. While using, one can add plaint oil, fresh flower, which can take you not only health but also beauty. Easy setup inside-frame design (Assemble the fame according to the diagram attached, then place the cover of the frame), It only takes minutes to set up. 

Contents: Foldable sauna tent, 1 set of PVC support tubes, Steam Generator, Steam Hose, Manual (Please read manual before use) 
Requirements: 110 Volt Power Source If you are pregnant, you should not use the sauna belt. Always consult a doctor prior to using exercise equipment. If you have open wounds, you should consult your doctor before use. 
Legal Disclaimer: This product is not a medical device and it is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent diseases. If a condition persists, contact a doctor. We recommend that you do not rely solely on the information presented and that you always read labels, warnings, and directions before using or consuming a product.
feature_bullets: This item will be delivered curbside. To have the item delivered to a location of choice on your property, kindly make additional arrangements with a third party provider ahead of delivery
800w steam generator / timer can set up to 60 min maximum
Gray color tent & comes with blue or pink outline
Convenient sauna at home or anywhere, comes with everything you need to set up and use immediately
